messages.message: @avi, how do we handle images generated with the Streaming API? Are links to the files created available (but then a user needs to log in to retrieve)?

What do you mean by images? cc: @Balaram @Prakhar to help with more details if needed.
• The digitised docs -- I think these are possible to get from our filesystem APIs.
• or The response history -- I think we have the ability to add to the chat log with a separate API call (this is what our frontend uses). Someone can then pull this chat log by logging in, or potentially with API but may require handholding to find the chats.json file.
Images are the outputs generated by Converse, such as if a user prompts - `Create a pie chart ...`

In the frontend, Apex charts are used to generate visualisation. Streaming API will return the needed data to display the visualisation using Apex charts. @Prakhar Feel free to add more information here.
